verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to his sons <S%H1121><s%>, that they separate <S%H5144><s%> themselves from the holy things <S%H6944><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which they hallow unto me <S%H2490><s%>, and that they profane not my holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H376><s%>, Whosoever he be of all your seed <S%H2233><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>, that approacheth unto the holy things <S%H6944><s%>, which the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> hallow <S%H6942><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, having his uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> upon him <S%H5315><s%>, that soul shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from before me <S%H3068><s%>: I am Jehovah.

What man soever <S%H376><s%> of the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> is a leper <S%H6879><s%>, or hath an issue <S%H2100><s%>; he shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of the holy things <S%H6944><s%>, until he be clean <S%H2891><s%>. And whoso toucheth <S%H5060><s%> anything that is unclean <S%H2931><s%> by the dead <S%H5315><s%>, or a man <S%H376><s%> whose seed <S%H2233><s%> goeth from him <S%H3318><s%>;

or whosoever <S%H376><s%> toucheth <S%H5060><s%> any creeping thing <S%H8318><s%>, whereby he may be made unclean <S%H2930><s%>, or a man <S%H120><s%> of whom he may take uncleanness <S%H2930><s%>, whatsoever uncleanness he hath <S%H2932><s%>;

the soul <S%H5315><s%> that toucheth any such shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until the even <S%H6153><s%>, and shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of the holy things <S%H6944><s%>, unless <S%H518><s%> he bathe <S%H7364><s%> his flesh <S%H1320><s%> in water <S%H4325><s%>.
And when the sun <S%H8121><s%> is down <S%H935><s%>, he shall be clean <S%H2891><s%>; and afterward <S%H310><s%> he shall eat <S%H398><s%> of the holy things <S%H6944><s%>, because it is his bread.
That which dieth of itself <S%H5038><s%>, or is torn <S%H2966><s%> of beasts <S%H398><s%>, he shall not eat, to defile <S%H2930><s%> himself therewith <S%H3068><s%>: I am Jehovah.

They shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> my charge <S%H5375><s%>, lest they bear sin <S%H2399><s%> for it <S%H4191><s%>, and die therein <S%H2490><s%>, if they profane it <S%H3068><s%>: I am Jehovah who sanctifieth them <S%H6942><s%>.

There shall no stranger <S%H2114><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> of the holy thing <S%H6944><s%>: a sojourner <S%H8453><s%> of the priest <S%H3548><s%>'s, or a hired servant <S%H7916><s%>, shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of the holy thing <S%H6944><s%>.

But if a priest <S%H3548><s%> buy <S%H7069><s%> any soul <S%H5315><s%>, the purchase of his money <S%H3701><s%>, he shall eat <S%H398><s%> of it <S%H3211><s%>; and such as are born in his house <S%H1004><s%>, they shall eat of his bread <S%H398><s%>.
And if a priest <S%H3548><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%> be married unto a stranger <S%H376><s%>, she shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of the heave-offering <S%H8641><s%> of the holy things <S%H6944><s%>.

But if a priest <S%H3548><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%> be a widow <S%H490><s%>, or divorced <S%H1644><s%>, and have no child <S%H2233><s%>, and be returned <S%H7725><s%> unto her father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, as in her youth <S%H5271><s%>, she shall eat <S%H398><s%> of her father <S%H1><s%>'s bread <S%H2114><s%>: but there shall no stranger eat thereof <S%H398><s%>.

And if a man <S%H376><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> of the holy thing <S%H6944><s%> unwittingly <S%H7684><s%>, then he shall put <S%H3254><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%> part thereof unto it <S%H5414><s%>, and shall give unto the priest <S%H3548><s%> the holy thing <S%H6944><s%>.
And they shall not profane <S%H2490><s%> the holy things <S%H6944><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which they offer <S%H7311><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>,

and so cause them to bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> that bringeth guilt <S%H819><s%>, when they eat <S%H398><s%> their holy things <S%H6944><s%>: for I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> who sanctifieth them <S%H6942><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and to his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and unto all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H376><s%>, Whosoever he be of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, or of the sojourners <S%H1616><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that offereth <S%H7126><s%> his oblation <S%H7133><s%>, whether it be any of their vows <S%H5088><s%>, or any of their freewill-offerings <S%H5071><s%>, which they offer <S%H7126><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> for a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>;
that ye may be accepted <S%H7522><s%>, ye shall offer a male <S%H2145><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%>, of the bullocks <S%H1241><s%>, of the sheep <S%H3775><s%>, or of the goats <S%H5795><s%>.
But whatsoever hath a blemish <S%H3971><s%>, that shall ye not offer <S%H7126><s%>: for it shall not be acceptable for you <S%H7522><s%>.

And whosoever <S%H376><s%> offereth <S%H7126><s%> a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> to accomplish <S%H6381><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%>, or for a freewill-offering <S%H5071><s%>, of the herd <S%H1241><s%> or of the flock <S%H6629><s%>, it shall be perfect <S%H8549><s%> to be accepted <S%H7522><s%>; there shall be no blemish therein <S%H3971><s%>.

Blind <S%H5788><s%>, or broken <S%H7665><s%>, or maimed <S%H2782><s%>, or having a wen <S%H2990><s%>, or scurvy <S%H1618><s%>, or scabbed <S%H3217><s%>, ye shall not offer <S%H7126><s%> these unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, nor make <S%H5414><s%> an offering by fire <S%H801><s%> of them upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Either a bullock <S%H7794><s%> or a lamb <S%H7716><s%> that hath anything superfluous <S%H8311><s%> or lacking in his parts <S%H7038><s%>, that mayest thou offer <S%H6213><s%> for a freewill-offering <S%H5071><s%>; but for a vow <S%H5088><s%> it shall not be accepted <S%H7521><s%>.

That which hath its stones bruised <S%H4600><s%>, or crushed <S%H3807><s%>, or broken <S%H5423><s%>, or cut <S%H3772><s%>, ye shall not offer <S%H7126><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; neither shall ye do <S%H6213><s%> thus in your land <S%H776><s%>.

Neither from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of a foreigner <S%H5236><s%> shall ye offer <S%H7126><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of your God <S%H430><s%> of any of these <S%H4893><s%>; because their corruption is in them <S%H3971><s%>, there is a blemish in them <S%H7521><s%>: they shall not be accepted for you.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

When a bullock <S%H7794><s%>, or a sheep <S%H3775><s%>, or a goat <S%H5795><s%>, is brought forth <S%H3205><s%>, then it shall be seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> under the dam <S%H517><s%>; and from the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> and thenceforth <S%H1973><s%> it shall be accepted <S%H7521><s%> for the oblation of an offering <S%H7133><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
And whether it be cow <S%H7794><s%> or ewe <S%H7716><s%>, ye shall not kill <S%H7819><s%> it and its young <S%H1121><s%> both in one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.
And when ye sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, ye shall sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> it that ye may be accepted <S%H7522><s%>.
On the same day <S%H3117><s%> it shall be eaten <S%H398><s%>; ye shall leave <S%H3498><s%> none of it until the morning <S%H1242><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Therefore shall ye keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H3068><s%>: I am Jehovah.

And ye shall not profane <S%H2490><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>; but I will be hallowed <S%H6942><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> who halloweth you <S%H6942><s%>,
who brought you out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, to be your God <S%H430><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
